metadata.title: CVE-2023-31623 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the mp_box_copy component of openlink virtuoso-opensourcev7.2.9 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQLstatements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
